patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -27,9 +27,15 @@
   deadline: Date,
   startDate: Date,
   endDate: Date,
 
-  attachments: [String], // files or image URLs
+  attachments: [
+  {
+    url: String,
+    publicId: String,
+    resourceType: String
+  }
+],
 
 }, { timestamps: true });
 
 module.exports = mongoose.model("Listing", listingSchema);

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -29,11 +29,11 @@
   endDate: Date,
 
   attachments: [
   {
-    url: String,
-    publicId: String,
-    resourceType: String
+    url: { type: String, required: true },
+    publicId: { type: String, required: true },
+    resourceType: { type: String, default: "image" } // image/raw/video
   }
 ],
 
 }, { timestamps: true });
